TopicTitle: So... console players, have we given up yet?

Articles.Content: I sure as hell have. I'm sick of waiting 2 years for updates that should have been here months ago. I saw somewhere that one of the KSP staff said we'd have them by year's end. How much y'all wanna bet that was a lie to get us off their backs so they can forget the failure that is KSP "Enhanced" Edition?
